mixed-citation.article-title: Hydroids (Cnidaria, Hydrozoa) from the Vema and Valdivia seamounts (SE Atlantic)

tp:treatment-sec.p:
Turritopsis sp.
– Gil 2017: 37–41, fig. 6a . —
Gil et al . 2020: 7–8
, fig. 2a.

Turritopsis sp.
was collected from depths of 18 to 1581 m at several localities stretching from Western Sahara to Gabon (Gil 2017).
